config.title: The config Schema
examples:
volumeMounts:
  - name: secrets-store-inline
    mountPath: /mnt/secrets
    readOnly: true
volumes:
  - name: secrets-store-inline
    hostPath:
      path: /run/desktop/mnt/host/c/tmp/secrets
      type: Directory
